metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000342 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier ECDSA does notfully validate ASN.1 encoding of signature on verification. It is possibleto inject extra elements in the sequence making up the signature and stillhave it validate, which in some cases may allow the introduction of'invisible' data into a signed structure.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
